title: Stones

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Throw a stone at someone’s window. (2 uses per night)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-If your target is non-evil, they will be alerted that you’re Stones (2915), and therefore Town.
-If your target is evil, the glass on their window breaks, and the stone permanently reduces their defense by 1. They are not told who has thrown the stone, as they get too distracted by it to look.
-Defense lowering is stackable.
-You are not told if your target's window breaks or not.

desc:

Guys, I balanced it! It’s an actual legal role, guys!
